Asset.Name: ReplaceableParts
Asset.Description: Replaceable parts is a kind of manufacturing process by which many duplicate copies of an item are fabricated, each of them identical component parts. This process allows for a tremendous increase in the speed and profitability of manufacturing, which in turn helped fuel the Industrial Revolution of the 19th Century.
Asset.Quote: "Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs." - Henry Ford
Asset.Notes: Allows you to build Infantry, a basic Industrial Era land unit, and the Anti-Tank Gun, a weapon specialized in defeating enemy Tanks.
